channel.title: Adding npc drops
channel.description:
I am trying to do it right but when i try to do it, it doesnt work.... I want something to drop something so i go into npcdrops.cfg and change the drops... esay huh? (thats what i thought) but it doesnt work, it still drops nothing!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I'm pretty mad because i want to add alot of NPCs but i only got like 50 right now so thats like nothing....
CAN SOME1 PLZ PLZ PLZ PLZ PLZ PLZ TELL ME HOW TO add/change npc drops
[center][/center]PLZ!

item.title: Adding npc drops
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

go into tut list and search for random drops.

Read full topic
